ygData.subject: RE: possible big cheat for EQ....
ygData.msgSnippet: It s hard to hack something which almost exclusively runs on the server.  I believe they wrote it so that everything is verified by the server before working -
ygData.messageBody:
It's hard to hack something which almost exclusively runs on the server. I
believe they wrote it so that everything is verified by the server before
working - this isn't the same as UO or Diablo.

-----Original Message-----
From: kale usi [mailto:kaleusi@...]
Sent: Tuesday, August 17, 1999 1:48 PM
To: EQCheats@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [EQCheats] possible big cheat for EQ....

From: "kale usi" <kaleusi@...>

>From: "Justin Howard" <mhoward1@...>
>
>Nothing will come of it...
>

That's what they said about UO. Look what happened there.
Give it time,
someone's bound to hack it. All they've managed to do is
prolongue the
inevitable, because if it can be programmed, then someone
can counterprogram
it. It's just a matter of time. And if you think patches
will help, just
look at Diablo. It didn't stop them there. Personally, I
hope nothing comes
of it.

Just my 2 coppers worth.
